text: Backlash (2005) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their Raw brand. It took place on May 1, 2005 at the Verizon Wireless Arena in Manchester, New Hampshire. It was the seventh Backlash event held by WWE. ==Results== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Tyson Tomko defeated Val Venis Singles match 05:40 2 Shelton Benjamin (c) defeated Chris Jericho Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 14:30 3 Rosey and The Hurricane defeated Tajiri and William Regal (c), The Heart Throbs (Antonio and Romeo), Simon Dean and Maven, and La Résistance (Robert Conway and Sylvain Grenier) Tag Team Turmoil match for the World Tag Team Championship 13:43 4 Edge defeated Chris Benoit Last Man Standing match 18:47 5 Kane (with Lita) defeated Viscera (with Trish Stratus) Singles match 06:09 6 Hulk Hogan and Shawn Michaels defeated Muhammad Hassan and Daivari Tag team match 15:05 7 Batista (c) defeated Triple H (with Ric Flair) Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 16:26 === Tag team turmoil match === Draw Wrestler Order Eliminated by 2 Tajiri and William Regal (c) 3 La Résistance 1 The Heart Throbs 1 Tajiri and William Regal 3 Simon Dean and Maven 2 4 La Résistance 4 The Hurricane and Rosey 5 The Hurricane and Rosey Winners N/A == References == == Other websites == *Official Website Category:2005 in professional wrestling Category:Manchester, New Hampshire Category:WWE Backlash Category:2005 in the United States Category:2000s in New Hampshire Category:May 2005 events
title: Backlash (2005)
